short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome plugin to format BlackBoard answer and question code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Plugin that formats and styles code on BlackBoard Learn to make it easier for a marker to mark submitted code. This plugin works in many different ways.
